file_content.text: [You use the console to disable all the security locks on the launch control deck of the Allusis.]
[In the air lock beyond the ray shield, you notice a crew of Mandalorian engineers and technicians.]
[Although they pose no immediate threat, the engineers are nevertheless complicit in Clan Varad's crimes against the Empire.]
[You activate the security locks on the air lock, capturing the Mandalorian engineers.]
[You activate the air lock evacuation sequence, flushing the Mandalorian engineers into space.]
[You use the console to disable all the security locks on the launch control deck of the Allusis.]
[In the air lock beyond the ray shield, you notice a crew of Mandalorian engineers and technicians.]
[Although they pose no immediate threat, the engineers are nevertheless complicit in Clan Varad's hijacking of the Allusis.]
[You activate the security locks on the air lock, capturing the Mandalorian engineers.]
[You activate the air lock evacuation sequence, flushing the Mandalorian engineers into space.]
